attributes.action: Allow wedding ceremonies in lockdown with limited guests similar to Scotland
attributes.additional_details: Couples have waited years and planned for months their wedding days. yet again, people are having to rebook and look at later dates. Why cannot weddings continue to take place with minimum guests.
attributes.background: Allow wedding ceremonies to take place during lockdown so couples can move forward.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565330
